descriptionHtml:
Okay who doesn't love a good poisoned apple well I do and I was ever so heart broken that they took them out of the game in Skyrim so I put them back in I give you MY poisoned apples yep thats right this small mod reintroduces Poisoned apples into the game. 

Got a grudge against a princess 

or maybe a good little girl annoying the heck out of you 

your hubby needs to put in his place 

well look no further with the poisoned perk you can either kill them with kindness by "giving" them the apple 
or by simply slipping it onto their person your choice entirely.....have fun! 

AAAAAAh hhahahahahahhahhaaaaaaaa........ 


NOTE* 
for use only by evil witches those who are not evil witches some side effects may apply 
but are not limited to head acks neusia stumick pain and occasionally but most likely DEATH. 

Please use responsibly thank you! ^u^

Apples are located in a chest at Witchmist Grove! :3
author: Methusala-Nexus TLM_Hacker-Steam
